body:
Hi!

Who do I contact when I'm being accused of hacking by a specific player in every game I play?
This has happened many times the couple of days I've played here (I started to play a week ago).
I reported everytime and a moderator (I won't namedrop who) was on last time and one time before but nothing was done about it.

Should I send a mail? Or what do I do? I got screenshots as well. It's a bit annoying not being able to play when I'm being attacked by a specific player everytime I join.
body_tagged:

Should I send a mail? Or what do I do? I got screenshots as well. It's a bit annoying not being able to play when I'm being attacked by a specific player everytime I join.
title: Question to moderators

replies.body: You can go ahead and post it in Player Reports.
replies.body_tagged: You can go ahead and post it in Player Reports.

replies.body: Will it be taken serious, as my reports in-game isn't?
replies.body_tagged: Will it be taken serious, as my reports in-game isn't?

reply_to.body: You can go ahead and post it in Player Reports.
reply_to.body_tagged: You can go ahead and post it in Player Reports.

replies.body: Player reports are always done. The only reason in-game reports aren't done is due to no staff being online.
replies.body_tagged: Player reports are always done. The only reason in-game reports aren't done is due to no staff being online.

reply_to.body: Will it be taken serious, as my reports in-game isn't?
reply_to.body_tagged: Will it be taken serious, as my reports in-game isn't?

replies.body: A moderator was on and watched it happening one time, but nothing was done about it. I made a player report anyways, thank you.
replies.body_tagged: A moderator was on and watched it happening one time, but nothing was done about it. I made a player report anyways, thank you.

replies.body: Or staff following up on other reports

replies.body: They probably did /warn, but you  didn't know.
replies.body_tagged: They probably did /warn, but you  didn't know.

replies.body:
"Will it be taken serious, as my reports in-game isn't?"

In-game reports are only visible to any staff in-game, while forum reports are visible to any staff on the forums and stay on the forums permanently.
replies.body_tagged:
"Will it be taken serious, as my reports in-game isn't?"

In-game reports are only visible to any staff in-game, while forum reports are visible to any staff on the forums and stay on the forums permanently.

replies.body: Usually, hackusations are punished by a warning.
replies.body_tagged: Usually, hackusations are punished by a warning.

replies.body: Just a single accusation would be a warning, but excessive accusations would be a tempban.
replies.body_tagged: Just a single accusation would be a warning, but excessive accusations would be a tempban.

reply_to.body: Usually, hackusations are punished by a warning.
reply_to.body_tagged: Usually, hackusations are punished by a warning.

replies.body: I do understand what you are saying, a moderator was in-game and saw everything that happened, however, no action was taken.
replies.body_tagged: I do understand what you are saying, a moderator was in-game and saw everything that happened, however, no action was taken.

replies.body: Dont worry it happens to most of us, most of the time its just mad players trying to find a way to criticize you.
replies.body_tagged: Dont worry it happens to most of us, most of the time its just mad players trying to find a way to criticize you.

replies.body: If you have a problem with a staff member tell a Senior Moderator or higher via Skype.
replies.body_tagged: If you have a problem with a staff member tell a Senior Moderator or higher via Skype.

replies.body: Yeah, I know, I don't mind when players accuse me of hacking, but when it's the same player following me and doing it every game I play, it becomes a bit redundant. I think it's because of the difference in my KD in the short amount of time I've played here.

replies.body:
If you feel like a particular staff member has not done their job well enough, please email or contact Senior Staff with clear and precise proof.

However, you will not be banned just off other users accusing you of 'hacking'...
I also want to add that you may report players for breaking the rules here: 
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=47

replies.body:
I will do next time, if I see it again.

Yes, I know I can't get banned when people accuse me of "hacking", it's about being attacked by the same player every single game I play. I did report the player on here right after my post yesterday, and I reported in-game multiple times.

replies.body: As multiple people might have already said, the staff member who was online might have warned them, but it's not visible to you.
replies.body_tagged: As multiple people might have already said, the staff member who was online might have warned them, but it's not visible to you.

replies.body: If a player is accusing you of hacking several times, the easiest way to report them would be to take a screenshot and post it under "Player Reports".
replies.body_tagged: If a player is accusing you of hacking several times, the easiest way to report them would be to take a screenshot and post it under "Player Reports".
